descriptions.description: A short description for your level.

information.description: Information regarding your level. Up to 350 characters long.

entry_point.description: The path to the main entry point of the level.

has_score_leaderboard.description: A boolean that specifies whether the level should have a score leaderboard.

rank_thresholds_1p.description: Contains the requirements for the players to unlock bronze, silver, and gold stars.
